articles.title: South African woman gets life sentence for selling her 6-year-old daughter - CBS News
articles.description: A South African court sentenced a woman to life in prison for kidnapping and selling her six-year-old daughter, in a case that horrified the country.
articles.content:
A South African court on Thursday sentenced a woman to life in prison for kidnapping and selling her six-year-old daughter, in a case that horrified the country.
